message.content:
cs.MM, cs.CV, cs.CR, cs.IT, cs.LG. 

The paper proposes a method for tamper detection and recovery using semi-fragile data hiding, which involves techniques such as Lifting Wavelet Transform (LWT), Discrete Cosine Transform (DCT), and Feed-Forward Neural Network (FNN). These techniques are commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV), multimedia (cs.MM), and information theory (cs.IT) research. The paper also discusses the use of Speeded Up Robust Features (SURF) algorithm, which is a popular feature detection and description method in computer vision. Additionally, the paper evaluates the robustness of the proposed method against various attacks, which is a common topic in the computer security (cs.CR) and machine learning (cs.LG) communities.
